Position Title:
Director, Engineering-NoCal

External Description:
Teradatas Analytical Ecosystem organization is seeking a Director of Data Science to join our team of researchers who build automated reasoning solutions to manage data, algorithms, and applications across heterogeneous analytic ecosystems. In this role, you will manage a group of data scientists, analysts and engineers providing thought leadership and collaboration.About the RoleReporting directly to the VP of Engineering, the Director of Data Science will define the strategy for the workload analytics data science team and lead a multi-disciplinary team of data scientists, analysts and engineers. This will include the following responsibilities:What You HaveYou are a thought leader who is passionate about the challenges of understanding how highly complex, massively parallel processing systems behave and have the audacity to define how they should be operated and optimized. The ideal candidate is a highly motivated individual who is ready to participate in a team environment and contribute to the success of Teradata. You have a positive attitude and are driven by intellectual curiosity. You bring excellent organizational and time management skills where scheduling priorities and efficiency in system configuration is essential.Your career achievements include:*Our total compensation approach includes a competitive base salary, 401(k), strong work/family programs, and medical, dental and disability coverage. Teradata is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer and commits to hiring returning veterans.
